mutants.original_line: filtered_dict = {char: indices for char, indices in sorted_dict.items() if char in repeated_chars}
mutants.mutated_line: filtered_dict = {char: indices for (char, indices) in sorted_dict.items() if char not in repeated_chars}
filtered_dict = {char: indices for (char, indices) in sorted_dict.items() if char in repeated_chars}
